vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.2; also called Raamiah at Neh.7.7;
Another name of re.e.la.yah (רְעֵלָיָה "Reelaiah" H7480)
§ Raamiah = "thunder of Jehovah"
1) one who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
1a) also 'Reelaiah'
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉米 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的雷電"
1) 一個跟隨所羅巴伯歸回者 #尼 7:7|
1a)也可拼成'利來雅'[07480]
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉米 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华的雷电"
1) 一个跟随所罗巴伯归回者 #尼 7:7|
1a)也可拼成'利来雅'[07480]
